clinical_study.brief_title: Application of Circulating Exosomes in Early Diagnosis and Prognosis Evaluation After Intracerebral Hemorrhage
clinical_study.official_title: Application of Circulating Exosomes in Early Diagnosis and Prognosis Evaluation After Intracerebral Hemorrhage

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to observe the relationship between the changes of circulating exosomes and the development and outcome of the disease in patients with intracerebral hemorrhage, and to search for early serum markers and potential intervention targets for disease monitoring in patients with intracerebral hemorrhage

primary_outcome.measure: The type and content of circulating exosomes
primary_outcome.description: After the exosomes were isolated, RNA sequencing and proteome sequencing were performed to identify the change of circulating exosomes

primary_outcome.time_frame: from onset to three months or six months
primary_outcome.description: mRS scores was divided into seven grades (0-6). The higher the score, the more severe the symptoms

secondary_outcome.time_frame: through study completion，an average of 1 year
From hospitalization to discharge，up to one month

study_pop.textblock: All of the ICH patients receiving treatment in Tangdu Hospital during 2021-2022
